website_summaries.verdict: You don't typically find piñatas in the likeness of cows, which makes this model worth considering for shoppers who want an out-of-the-ordinary option.
pros: Interesting cow construction is suitable for parties with outdoor or country themes
Although it's not huge, it can fit a surprising amount of candy for its size
cons: Mixed opinions on the graphics – some consumers found the face adorable, while others thought it has a "sad" or "creepy" appearance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time buying this pinata. It's small perfect for a large bag of candy. It's sturdy. Takes a while to break. It's cute. And it's priced well. I attached photos. I had 9 kids ranging from 1 to 13 hitting this thing and each kid got to hit the pinata 6 times a piece before it finally busted! We also had so much candy left over. So this pinata holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great visual; hard to break
customer_reviews.text: There is no doubt that this was adorable, particularly for a farmyard themed birthday party for little children. The downside is that it was almost impossible to break. No small child came close. We had to bring in the big guns - couple of 12 year olds - to subdue the cow. This is, honestly, a flaw for a piñata. The theme and decoration value were spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Jenrus

customer_reviews.title: We shall see how it holds up
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this yet , but I guess I didn’t look at the size in the description or even look through pictures , my fault on that . Since it’s for a first birthday I don’t need a huge piñata. But when I opened it the face kinda through me off lol definitely will have people talking . Looks like it can be a hit or miss with the faces . But from other reviews have said seems like it’s sturdy which is a plus ! Good for the theme . Just make sure you read the size and look at more pics before buying . Not the prettiest but let’s see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and scary
customer_reviews.text: Very small and scary looking. When I ordered mine I expected it to look like an actual cow, but what I received scared the kids at my son’s first birthday. Never again. Also, it’s very small for a piñata. Didn’t hold a lot of candy
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY terrible. I have never had a problem with Amazon until today. So unhappy with this purchase. My little boy was so upset. He thought is was a donkey or a dying cow. Ear was broke. Both sides of stomach were smashed. Just pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is evil and must be punished
customer_reviews.text: This cursed object performs its function nicely, but it is much cuter in the picture than in real life. In real life it looks like someone slapped a too human looking face on a cow. Holds a surprisingly large amount of candy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Small pinata
customer_reviews.text: Small pinata; very cute! My only complaint is that the hole cut in it you would use to fill the pinata was covered with tissue paper used to decorate the pinata. So once to fill the pinata you will have a nice size hole on one side of your pinata.
customer_reviews.author: Rie

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: I have never been happier with any purchase. This cow pinata was hilarious to have at our wedding, which (like every other wedding) was "farm-themed/rustic/on a ranch" - the kids loved beating this little guy (and when I say little, this thing is seriously small compared to what we expected!). It held up pretty well until my groom got a hold of it. Other than the size, which still makes me laugh since my dog kept growling at it and thinking it was a small beagle, we were thrilled with this hilarious purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E.

customer_reviews.title: cute but kind of small
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for a party i held for a friend who loves cows. it was smaller than i expected when it arrived (about the size of my fat cat), but it ended up being the perfect size for 4 people to all get a decent amount of goodies out of it. if you are having a larger party you may want to buy multiple or get a different one.
customer_reviews.author: grem

customer_reviews.title: Cute but needs a better attachment.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable except at the attachment. After around 30-40 hits it tore free from the zip tie attachment onto the ground. Ended up throwing candy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: So ugly it's cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a bachelorette party for a recently graduated veterinarian. Its largely made of cardboard not paper mache. It was solid enough for us to carry to the bars and dance with all night. Not sure it would break well for a kids party
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a "hit"
customer_reviews.text: I sent this, in addition to 4lbs of pinata candy, to my best friend for her graduation. To say it was a "hit" is both a pun and an understatement. Who wouldn't want a pinata for their graduation? It is cost effective and a very unique gift to send long distance. Not to mention, amazon prime. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: rsh09

customer_reviews.title: Damage item
customer_reviews.text: What happened to the cow ears....this thing is used😠so mad.
customer_reviews.author: Tania l

customer_reviews.title: i mean its a cow pinata
customer_reviews.text: used this for spanish class not very durable but it sure looks cute. only took one hit.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: It is extremely adorable (about the size of my 10 lb maltese) and ...
customer_reviews.text: So I was expecting something MUCH bigger lol-- but that was completely MY FAULT for not reading the dimensions. HOWEVER, It is extremely adorable (about the size of my 10 lb maltese) and will perfect for a bunch of 3&4 year olds. Very cute!! Side note: I was reading the previous comment, and for anyone who cares-- the udders on my cow did point east and west, not south. And the cowbell was not 3d, it was just a printed image. However, its cute and I dont care :)
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable but ears came smashed and when I tried to lift them up I broke one. Smaller than in thought so I just used it as a prop.
customer_reviews.author: DNB SOTO

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for my son’s first birthday. Much smaller than expected. These things were TOUGH so it made the piñata game last a lot longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty small
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my twins cow birthday party! It was pretty small. So we just saved for decoration for their room
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Burgett

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge HIT (haha😉) at my sons 2nd birthday party! All the kids had several turns. Wasn’t too hard to break and it didn’t break right away. It was PERFECT and looked exactly like it does in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Bp

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: This pinata was a big hit at the party! The zip tie loop that you attached the rope to did break off after a couple hits but we just tied the rope around the head and continued on
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Wheeler

customer_reviews.text: It is very cute but had nowhere to put the candy I had to cut. I don't know if they are all like this or if it was just mine
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Jose de oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it looked more like a dying goat then a cow. Did not look like picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: If size is ok with you
customer_reviews.text: It was a hit for 7! yr old. You fill candy. But it was rather small. I expected one like you’d get in the stores
customer_reviews.author: Scraps

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was bigger I do not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Macario

customer_reviews.title: Precious!
customer_reviews.text: Great pinata! Extremely sturdy too! Not realistic looking, but so cute you have to laugh when you look at it! Great addition to our grandson's birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Snyder

customer_reviews.title: What moooore could you want??
customer_reviews.text: This really was cute and fit 4 pounds of food. Held up to a bunch of hitting too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lang

customer_reviews.title: MoMo the Cow
customer_reviews.text: It looks like MoMo. Absolutely creepy looking. I’m 90% sure it’s possessed. Literally looks NOTHING like advertised.
customer_reviews.author: logan ko

customer_reviews.title: did my own version
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was graduating from college and I wanted to do something really different and unusual. He's going into accounting, so I thought a "cash cow" would be fun. It was time consuming because I had ones and fives to fill the pinata and I wanted to wrap each one individually, so it took awhile, but then I threw in a bunch of candy, so he wasn't totally bored while looking for the cash. The gift was a big "hit"!
customer_reviews.author: marian

customer_reviews.title: Smallllll
customer_reviews.text: Smalllllll. Seriously. Body is about as big as a full size football.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Cutest lil cow
customer_reviews.text: We loved this little cow it was easy to fill and super cute
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Changed Opinion/Review from Negative to Positve
customer_reviews.text: I'd previously reviewed this piñata negatively. Since then, we actually used it. It proved very sturdy, and held up to multiple attempts to break it open. 1st to 5th graders attempted it, and it stayed intact until the last 5th grader hit it. Although it doesn't appear very impressive, it did a such a good job that I felt I had to change my review.
customer_reviews.author: D2

customer_reviews.title: Nice choice for pinata
customer_reviews.text: Was very durable and held up very nicely. Held A LOT of candy! More than I thought would fit. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bobbins

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing like the picture. Whenever it came in, It looked like a depressed cow.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dorrell

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We could not get this thing to break!! The kids all went through it twice and finally had the big kids bust it open.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller than expected but very cute and it went perfectly with our farm themed party.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible!!!! I don't know how this has 4 stars overall! There was not even a actual whole for the candy to go in!
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Ream

customer_reviews.title: Medium Sized
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was a great pinata. I read enough reviews before buying to expect a small pinata. I actually would classify this as "medium" but in any case, it was perfect for my 2 year old's birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Says

customer_reviews.title: Too tiny
customer_reviews.text: The cow is cute but too tiny not good for a bfay party piñata with 20 kids maybe 7 kids
customer_reviews.author: marcia loja

customer_reviews.title: Item as discribed, but i had typed in mind ...
customer_reviews.text: Item as discribed, but i had typed in mind craft for son party supplies... this is not a mind craft cow. It was also much smaller than i thought and was very difficult for kids to break open
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Geer

customer_reviews.title: Old McDonald had a Donkey?
customer_reviews.text: Be forewarned that the cow pictured above is NOT what you will receive. The bell is simply a photocopied piece of paper, and the udders are pointing east & west, as opposed to hanging south. Additionally, the face of the cow being shipped is flat-faced...a mix between a donkey and a zebra. If you prefer a cow that appears realistic, like the one pictured, then I would not recommend you purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Heat

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly like the photo...
customer_reviews.text: Looks like someone punched him in the face in order to fit him in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute cow
customer_reviews.text: It is a little smaller than expected but very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eid ul Adha "sacrificial" animals!
customer_reviews.text: So nice! We bought these in bulk to celebrate Eid ul Adha (celebration of Abraham's sacrifice in Islam) with the children at Islamic School. Such a fun idea to "sacrifice" cow pinatas. Well made, easy to fill, beautiful pinatas.
customer_reviews.author: Mitah Iam

customer_reviews.title: Great piñata! Knocking the head off makes for interesting stories!
customer_reviews.text: It's funny, one of the review photos here also has a cow with its head knocked off haha. But anyway, the piñata was a great success. Bought this for a college party (21+) and it ACTUALLY sustained quite a beating. For awhile we were using a wooden stick--granted, we were also blindfolded and missing a few times--but even when we took out a metal bat (it was surviving TOO long) it took a hit with that as well The body is definitely the more durable part, as the head came off with one clean swing (the candy still stayed inside). Overall very happy with my purchase, the piñata was very cute and a very funny addition to our picnic party
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ebs

customer_reviews.title: Pinata? yes.  Cow? no.
customer_reviews.text: The kids thought it was a dog... but it is a functioning pinata which they enjoyed mutilating with a bat. Nice and sturdy, put up a good fight. Took many blows before the feeding frenzy began.
customer_reviews.author: Jumbaco

customer_reviews.title: So tiny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is super tiny!!! Like for babies and toddlers to hit.
customer_reviews.author: MemoryLane

customer_reviews.title: It’s smaller
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little small and some pieces look cheap but it is cute
customer_reviews.author: Ashley King

customer_reviews.title: Looks nothing like a cow
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing like a cow. :( unfortunately the party is too close so I'll have to try fixing it up to look better and use it. I would not complain if it wasn't so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Ramblinrose

customer_reviews.title: decent pinata
customer_reviews.text: ended up putting a pretty big hole in the side of this thing to fit in what I had to put in it. However it did stay together and took a while to beat it open. I would probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brett & Family

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Way to small for the price. Ears looked like donkeys not a cow
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: My nieces loved it!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pinata I have ordered from the company and this little cow will take a lot of filling, I could have put more in but I ran out of things. My nieces loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: John in MD

customer_reviews.title: Cute little guy.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my niece's farm-themed birthday party. Just used as a table decoration since we thought it might be a bad idea to give 2 year-olds bats. He lives to see another party!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Dinger

customer_reviews.title: Like It Very Much
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Arrived in great condition. Possibly a tad on the smaller side. Very cute, though the face might have been just a little cuter.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Metaxas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it. I was pleased. Very cute and sturdy. Great piñata and it served its purpose. Small but that's what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia casiano

customer_reviews.title: cute pinata
customer_reviews.text: cow pinata is cute. wish the hole to fill it was a little easier to access but no big deal. its cute and it works for the party we are having
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than expected & not a very cute face.
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than expected & not a very cute face.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Bought this for my son's 1st birthday party and the small size is perfect for the littles.
customer_reviews.author: DawnDSouthern

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, and though it is small it holds at least two pretty good sized bags of candy! All the kids had fun with this at my daughter's first birthday, it was a farm animal theme!
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and decent size.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and decent size. The youngsters couldn't really break it open while hanging so put it on ground and let them beat it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take long before this little fella became ground Beef....
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: very small and does look funny. but will work for my small family and ...
customer_reviews.text: very small and does look funny. but will work for my small family and my 2 year olds party
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved this pinata!!
customer_reviews.text: This was cuter in person than on the photo. Nice size and was so cute.
customer_reviews.author: kathyljs

customer_reviews.title: We Luv him!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small piñata for a very small party. This is exactly what I needed. Accurate as described it. My son is in a phase where he loves cows and farms and he loves it. Our party isn't for a few days but my son is walking the cow piñata around w him in the house. Why not...? It's his piñata! We will fill it on day of party. Real cute and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: its a pinata
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than i thought but served its purpose. Its not supposed to be educational or durable, its meant to be beaten.
customer_reviews.author: Storyoftheeye

customer_reviews.title: just ok, not big enough...
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot smaller than expected and the place for the candy was also smaller. Would not buy it again but worked ok.
customer_reviews.author: G. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it! We had 5 boys(age 7 to 10) ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it! We had 5 boys(age 7 to 10) swing at it at least 3 times each before the candy came out. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! Got it for a "farm themed" bachelorette party..filled it with cow pie candies and other goodies..so sweet! LOL
customer_reviews.author: kfs

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Pinata
customer_reviews.text: This Cow was so much better quality than I expected. Very cute and very well made. Would definitley recommend for a party for small children where you don't need a huge pinata.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it'd be but still a really cute piñata!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Larson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute Piñata! Worked well at the party and held up well with the little and big kids swings;)
customer_reviews.author: Hilly

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this cow for my babyshower. It holds about 1 lb of candy. Its so cute I couldn't destroy it! I still have the cow but now I use it as a room decoration for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: eyvelisse

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible piñatas are hilarious, unless you're at a 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Indestructible piñatas are hilarious, unless you're at a 2 year olds birthday party. Luckily dad stepped in and helped get the piñata open.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Majestic and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This pinata is the most amazing pinata I have ever seen. It is so majestic and beautiful, right down to it's udders. Speaking of which, whoever commented that the udders point "east and west" and not "south", they are suppose to point horizontally and vertically; don't listen to what this person says about this pinata, they don't know what they're talking about. Anyways, coming from someone who loves cows, this pinata is perfect. I was so happy with this purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Maddy Trolinger

customer_reviews.title: Great for a farm theme birthday party of about a dozen children
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I thought. You can only fill it with 2 lbs of candy and toys but I used almost 4 lbs and it worked out fine. We left it hanging for a couple of hours before whacking it and it held up well. We just couldn't figure out where the string to open it was, but since one of the girls hit it so hard that it broke the leg of the pinata, my husband just pulled the leg open to release the contents. Everybody loved it and it was perfect for my baby's farm theme 1st birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: MC2

customer_reviews.title: Was a great addition to the party
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old's birthday party and it was great! First pinata ever. It was easy to put the candy in, but it was actually harder to break than I'd anticipated (perhaps that's a good thing because all the kids got to hit it!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: I bought two piñata in amazon and they look really cute , kids all like it and they think is really fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Chen

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: This piñata is just okay...a little on the small side and it came a little smooshed. My 8 year old didn't seem to mind it too bad but prepare yourself to be underwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: shawbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Pinata
customer_reviews.text: This pinata was incredible! It arrived in 2 days, and it just so inexpensive! It was a pretty small pinata, about the size of a small dog. It got very heavy though when it was filled with candy. I put nearly 5 pounds of candy inside, it can hold more than it looks! Overall great buy and I was completely satisfied with what I got for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: They had fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable!!!!! Took alot for the kids to get it open!! They had fun!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: cute---Will see how the children like it when Christmas comes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute piñata, but NOT pull string!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to do my son's piñata for his party in the house and don't have a place to hang it and have enough room to swing a bat around....was really counting on the pull string feature to be on this piñata and it's not!
customer_reviews.author: Marika Conrad

product_meta.title: Ya Otta Pinata Cow
product_meta.description: This great Pinata will guarantee fun to your birthday party or any other special celebration. Pinatas are great to be filled with treats, sweets or small toys. Smash them with a bat to release the goodies inside. Bat and blindfolds sold separately.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars247 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
